body:
Job Responsibilities:
1.Support one of the Huawei telecommunication technical service domain, Radio access network, Core network, Networking or RAN planning and optimization.
2.Provide network design, commissioning, integration, acceptance and migration technical service for telecommunication networking products and solutions.
3.Handle the technical problems reported by customers or other support organizations.
4.Deliver validation testing for telecommunication networking products, functions and features by collaborating with customer and R&D.
General Requirements:
1.Demand an academic degree minimum on bachelor degree in telecommunications, information technology, information engineering, computer science, applied electronics, automatic control and other relevant area.
2.Need good communication and presentation skills in English language.
3.Need excellent teamwork abilities and interpersonal skills.
4.Need adaptability for participating projects aboard.
Professional Requirements:
1.Understand any of the mobile telecommunication fundaments and principles: GSM, CDMA, UMTS, WiMAX, LTE, Routing, Switching, WDM, SDH, MPLS, xDSL, FTTx.
2.Familiar with telecommunication elements and functions: BTS, BSC, NodeB, RNC, eNodeB, MGW, MSC, SGSN, GGSN, MME, IMS, Router, Switch, DSLAM, RTN, OSN etc.
3.Have internship or training in telecommunication domain. (Optional)
title: Global Technical Services Engineer-Fresh graduated
